title: A pillar has a height of 10 feet, breadth of 8 inches, and length of 8 inch. How many square feet is this? - Quora

response.answer_text: Breadth and length are same it is a square pillar of size 8″ or 8/12 '. Surface area is 2(l+b)h+ 2lb We have l=b =2/3 feet h =10 feet S.A=2(2/3+2/3)10+ 2(2/3×2/3) =2(4/3)×10+2(4/9) sqft =80/3+8/9 sq ft. =8/9(30+1) =248/9 ft² =27.56 ft²
